title: Vipbtc
author: Vipbtc
content: I started futures signal channel with insurance.So If you follow the signals i say then you get your losses covered.Im motivated more to provide quality signals so i don't have to give insurance funds out.If signal hit to stop loss you get refunded.Ask a question and suggestions.

comments.author: Fatunad
comments.body: Win-win situation? I do see these things do happen only in dreams on where you do trade up and if you do lose up a trade then you do make out some refund?Are you Santa Claus?  So whats the catch? For sure you would be charging up huge % in commission for profitable trades to cope up something with this kind of idea.You should really be at least transparent on how you would really be making profits too out of those followers and you cant really expectthat you would be able to hook up someone just because you do make out some insurance claims or loss-back which is definitelyunbelievable out of this world. lol

How much of the losses you will cover 10%, 50%, 100%? Are you willing to use an escrow?Yes i accept escrow.It will be one month insurance plan.For example If you use 100$ margin for each trade.For margin used for each trade it will be 120$ for 1monthYour margin used for each trade + 20% = your 1 month insurance plan.And 20% coverage from each stop loss. Here is how:If stop loss occured with 100$ margin you get refunded 20% wich is 20$ from 100$.You get instant refund so no waiting money will come in your wallet instantly the 20$ If signal will hit the stop loss.If you use Margin 300$ for each trade then your 1 month insurance will be 360$ After every one month you need to pay insurance again.Your 1 months insurance plan price will be Equal with your Margin to be used with each trade + 20% your stop loss coverage.Let's explain again ....Trader John using Margin 100$ for each trade so his insurance fee will be 120$ for 1 month period of insurance contract. Every time when signal will hit the stop loss he get payed  20% of the margin in to his wallet instantly.The trading channel monthly fee period of 30 days would be 30 usd. You can use trading signals without insurance also but then it Will be 30 USD monthly fee.The trader who's using 100$ margin for each trade for one month period.Total payment for one month 30 days. Margin 100$ + insurance coverage per trade 20% +monthly fee 30$ 100+20+30= 150$  Someone who's trusted and well known can hold insurance funds maybe bitcointalk admin but then i have to give the list of wallets to admin wich ones need to be refunded by insurance funds.Also If here are some good traders who can give decent results then we want you in our team you have opportunity to join first time project like this but you have to be good becouse better results we get from our trading the less insurance we have to pay out. I been in crypto trading about 7 years so me as trader myself only knows best what the other traders need.

comments.author: Issa56
comments.body: Quote from: Vipbtc on December 16, 2022, 11:31:51 PMI started futures signal channel with insurance.So If you follow the signals i say then you get your losses covered.I think it will be kind of better if you can explain more about this, how am I going to get my losses covered? Incase if I enter a trade and I lose, am I going to be paid back the amount I lose? Or do you mean if I can follow your trading signals then am not going to ever lose in any trade I enter? I think you should explain better because I don't know how my trades will be covered by insurance, I haven't seen this kind of offer before. If people are planning to join your signal group is it free or you are still going to ask people to pay? Or maybe you provided the offer just to encourage people to pay for your trading signal. I don't believe in trading signal and I won't encourage anyone to follow the signal.
